title: The Ember-Hush
description: The 'Eternal-Flame' in the High-Temple has stopped crackling. It's burning, but it's completely silent. The Priestess is terrified.

turns.narrative: The Temple is built of white marble and bone-ash. The Eternal-Flame is a pillar of violet-white fire that reaches the ceiling, but there is no sound. No heat. No smell. It's a 'Ghost-Fire'.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You hear a faint, 'Un-Sound' like a negative frequency. (+1 Lore)
turns.consequence_b: Success: Your hand doesn't burn; it becomes translucent for a second. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: A 'Hush-Ghost'—a creature with a mouth sewn shut with silver-thread—floats above the altar.

turns.narrative: The Hush-Ghost point to the 'Flame-Base'—a massive crystal bowl that is being filled with 'Void-Water' from an invisible leak.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You stop the infusion of the Void. (+1 Progress)
turns.consequence_b: Success: It's 'Liquid-Silence'—the blood of a dead god. (+1 Lore)
turns.convergence: The Hush-Ghost lets out a silent scream, and the Temple's bells begin to ring with a sound that has no noise.

turns.narrative: The bells are vibrating your internal organs. You feel your heart-rate synchronization with the 'Un-Sound'.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You maintain your physical integrity. (+1 Progress)
turns.consequence_b: Success: The bells' vibration breaks. (+100 XP)
turns.convergence: A central node of the flame—the 'Ember-Heart'—is being stolen by a portal of black glass.

turns.narrative: A pair of long, obsidian fingers are reaching through the portal to grab the Ember-Heart. The air is freezing.
turns.consequence_a: Success: The obsidian hand retreats, leaving behind a 'Void-Shard'. (+1 Loot)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You hold the heat of a thousand suns in your palm. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: The portal shatters, and the Temple is plunged into total darkness.

turns.narrative: In the dark, the Ember-Heart in your hand is the only light. You see the Priestess is being pulled into the 'Deep-Ward' floor.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You pull her from the living shadows. (+1 Progress)
turns.choice_b: Use the Ember-Heart to light the way
turns.consequence_b: Success: You reveal a hidden 'Logic-Staircase'. (+100 XP)
turns.convergence: A 'Silent-Warden'—a suit of armor filled with nothing but dust—blocks your path.

turns.narrative: The Warden's sword is a blade of 'Pure-Silence'. Every time it swings, the sound of the world is deleted for a second.
turns.consequence_a: Success: Your weapon rings with a sound that breaks the spell. (+1 Progress)
turns.choice_b: Blind the Warden with the Ember-Heart
turns.consequence_b: Success: The dust inside the armor ignites. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: The Warden collapses, leaving behind a 'Cape of the Silent'.

turns.narrative: You've reached the 'Flame-Root'—the furnace beneath the Temple. It's being clogged with 'Soot of the Void'.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You restore the proper airflow. (+1 Progress)
turns.choice_b: Ignite the soot with the Ember-Heart
turns.consequence_b: Success: The Void-matter is converted into 'Starlight-Refuse'. (+1 Loot)
turns.convergence: The Eternal-Flame roars back to life, its sound a comfort that brings tears to the Priestess's eyes.

turns.narrative: The Temple is warm once more. The sound of the flame is like a distant, rolling thunder. The Priestess offers you her 'Silver-Thread'.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You gain a tool that can sew shut any portal. (+1 Gear)
turns.consequence_b: Success: Your 'Faith' attribute increases permanently. (+1 Luck)
turns.convergence: A group of High-Ward officials enters, looking relieved and slightly annoyed at the disruption.

turns.narrative: The officials suspect the 'Hush-Ghost' was a result of a failed experiment in the 'Lower-Labs'.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You find blueprints for a 'Silence-Engine'. (+1 Intel)
turns.choice_b: Stay for a prayer of thanks
turns.consequence_b: Success: You receive a 'Pouch of Holy-Ash'. (+1 Loot)
turns.convergence: The Priestess promises to keep the 'Void-Shard' you found for further study.

turns.narrative: You leave the temple as the first bells of Dawn ring. They sound deep, clear, and very, very alive.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You are paid in 'Church-Marks'. (+950 Gold)
turns.choice_b: Return to the tavern for a drink
turns.consequence_b: Success: You tell the story of the Silent Flame. (+5 Reputation)

conclusion: The Ember-Hush was an attempt to suffocate the world's divinity. The flame burns bright, but the 'Obsidian fingers' are still reaching from the dark.

risk_matrix.penalty: Temple goes dark. -10 Morale and all 'Clerical' spells are disabled for a week.
risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with minor consequences.
